Function Documentation

const FONT_STRUCT* Font_Load ( CHAR *  szFontName_,
UCHAR  ucFontWidth_,
UCHAR  ucFlags_ 
)

Call this function at the end of main() to start the scheduler.

Parameters:
szFontName_ - the name of the font family (alphanumeric)
ucFontWidth_ - the point size of the font
ucFlags_ - font flags (bold, italic, underline, etc.)
